You will know how to identify a person that can potentially harm your child
You will know how to react and how to act correctly in case of harm to your child

items.title: Mindfulness for Mothers with author Leonie Laukkanen

visible_instructors.title: Leonie Laukkanen
visible_instructors.name: Leonie
visible_instructors.job_title: Intuitive Mentor, mindfulness teacher, author, speaker.

items.headline: The six essential elements to being a connected content and calm mother.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course mothers will be able to remain calm and present in their daily routine by practicing mindfulness.
As a result of being mindful, mothers will feel more joy and less stress, and have calm children and a connected family.

items.title: Couples Counseling Masterclass by Psychotherapist DrNica
items.headline: Do you repeat the same painful patterns in your relationship? How to break the cycle!
objectives_summary: How to recognise and connect with your inner child, parent and adult to heal yourself
How to understand which  part of you (child, parent or adult) is activated in your relationship
How to use this insight to understand yourself and your partner in order to heal your relationship through better communication, and empathy for each other

items.title: A Joyful Parenthood: A Guide to Parenting With Authenticity
items.headline: Learn how to parent with intention and not by accident
objectives_summary: You will begin by exploring and identifying your personal Core Values.
You will then build a "Family Garden" of Values that's inclusive of every member of the family.
You can utilize these Family Values to tune out the overwhelming amount of "expert advice".
